trans-unit.source: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Updated for UWP apps on Windows 10.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial describes how to declare device capabilities in Microsoft Visual Studio.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial describes how to declare device capabilities in Microsoft Visual Studio.

trans-unit.source: This enables your app to use cameras, microphones, location sensors, and other devices.
trans-unit.target: This enables your app to use cameras, microphones, location sensors, and other devices.

trans-unit.source: Specify the device capabilities your app will use
trans-unit.target: Specify the device capabilities your app will use

trans-unit.source: Windows apps require you to specify in the app package manifest when you use certain types of devices.
trans-unit.target: Windows apps require you to specify in the app package manifest when you use certain types of devices.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, you can declare most capabilities by using [Manifest Designer](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/xaml/br230259.aspx) or you can add them manually as described in [How to specify device capabilities in a package manifest (manually)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn263092).
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, you can declare most capabilities by using [Manifest Designer](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/apps/xaml/br230259.aspx) or you can add them manually as described in [How to specify device capabilities in a package manifest (manually)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn263092).

trans-unit.source: This tutorial assumes you're using Manifest Designer.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial assumes you're using Manifest Designer.

trans-unit.source: Some types of devices, such as printers, scanners, and sensors, don't need to be declared in the app package manifest.
trans-unit.target: Some types of devices, such as printers, scanners, and sensors, don't need to be declared in the app package manifest.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio Solution Explorer, double-click the package manifest file, **Package.appxmanifest**.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio Solution Explorer, double-click the package manifest file, **Package.appxmanifest**.

trans-unit.source: Select the device capabilities that your app uses.
trans-unit.target: Select the device capabilities that your app uses.

trans-unit.source: If you don't see the capability you're looking for in Manifest Designer, add it manually.
trans-unit.target: If you don't see the capability you're looking for in Manifest Designer, add it manually.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [How to specify device capabilities in a package manifest](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn263092).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [How to specify device capabilities in a package manifest](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn263092).

trans-unit.source: Allows AllJoyn-enabled apps and devices on a network to discover and interact with each other.
trans-unit.target: Allows AllJoyn-enabled apps and devices on a network to discover and interact with each other.

trans-unit.source: App apps that access APIs in the [**Windows.Devices.AllJoyn**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn894971) namespace must use this capability.
trans-unit.target: App apps that access APIs in the [**Windows.Devices.AllJoyn**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn894971) namespace must use this capability.

trans-unit.source: Allows apps to read SMS and MMS messages that have been blocked by the Spam Filter app.
trans-unit.target: Allows apps to read SMS and MMS messages that have been blocked by the Spam Filter app.

trans-unit.source: Allows apps to read and delete Text Messages.
trans-unit.target: Allows apps to read and delete Text Messages.

trans-unit.source: It also allows apps to store chat messages in the system data store.
trans-unit.target: It also allows apps to store chat messages in the system data store.

trans-unit.source: Allows apps to generate code dynamically.
trans-unit.target: Allows apps to generate code dynamically.

trans-unit.source: This capability is subject to the Windows Store policy.
trans-unit.target: This capability is subject to the Windows Store policy.

trans-unit.source: It provides the capability to connect to enterprise intranet resources that require domain credentials.
trans-unit.target: It provides the capability to connect to enterprise intranet resources that require domain credentials.

trans-unit.source: This capability is not typically needed for most apps.
trans-unit.target: This capability is not typically needed for most apps.

trans-unit.source: Provides outbound access to the Internet and networks in public places like airports and coffee shops.
trans-unit.target: Provides outbound access to the Internet and networks in public places like airports and coffee shops.

trans-unit.source: For example, Intranet networks where the user has designated the network as public.
trans-unit.target: For example, Intranet networks where the user has designated the network as public.

trans-unit.source: Most apps that require Internet access should use the capability.
trans-unit.target: Most apps that require Internet access should use the capability.

trans-unit.source: Provides inbound and outbound access to the Internet and the networks in public places like airports and coffee shops.
trans-unit.target: Provides inbound and outbound access to the Internet and the networks in public places like airports and coffee shops.

trans-unit.source: This capability is a superset of **Internet (Client)**.
trans-unit.target: This capability is a superset of **Internet (Client)**.

trans-unit.source: **Internet (Client)** doesn't need to be enabled if this capability is also enabled.
trans-unit.target: **Internet (Client)** doesn't need to be enabled if this capability is also enabled.

trans-unit.source: Inbound access to critical ports is always blocked.
trans-unit.target: Inbound access to critical ports is always blocked.

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the current location.
trans-unit.target: Provides access to the current location.

trans-unit.source: This is obtained from dedicated hardware like a GPS sensor in the PC, or derived from available network information.
trans-unit.target: This is obtained from dedicated hardware like a GPS sensor in the PC, or derived from available network information.

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the microphone's audio feed.
trans-unit.target: Provides access to the microphone's audio feed.

trans-unit.source: This allows the app to record from connected microphones.
trans-unit.target: This allows the app to record from connected microphones.

trans-unit.source: Provides the capability to add, change, or delete files in the **Music Library** for the local PC and **HomeGroup** PCs.
trans-unit.target: Provides the capability to add, change, or delete files in the **Music Library** for the local PC and **HomeGroup** PCs.

trans-unit.source: Provides programmatic access to the user's **3D Objects**, allowing the app to enumerate and access all files in the library without user interaction.
trans-unit.target: Provides programmatic access to the user's **3D Objects**, allowing the app to enumerate and access all files in the library without user interaction.

trans-unit.source: This capability is typically used in 3D apps and games that need to access the entire **3D Objects** library.
trans-unit.target: This capability is typically used in 3D apps and games that need to access the entire **3D Objects** library.

trans-unit.source: Allows apps to access all of the phone lines on the device and perform the following functions: place a call on the phone and show the system dialer without prompting the user; access line-related metadata; access line-related triggers.
trans-unit.target: Allows apps to access all of the phone lines on the device and perform the following functions: place a call on the phone and show the system dialer without prompting the user; access line-related metadata; access line-related triggers.

trans-unit.source: Allows the user-selected spam filter app to set and check the block list and call origin information.
trans-unit.target: Allows the user-selected spam filter app to set and check the block list and call origin information.

trans-unit.source: Provides the capability to add, change, or delete files in the **Pictures Library** for the local PC and **HomeGroup** PCs.
trans-unit.target: Provides the capability to add, change, or delete files in the **Pictures Library** for the local PC and **HomeGroup** PCs.

trans-unit.source: Provides inbound and outbound access to Intranet networks that have an authenticated domain controller, or that the user has designated as either home or work networks.
trans-unit.target: Provides inbound and outbound access to Intranet networks that have an authenticated domain controller, or that the user has designated as either home or work networks.

trans-unit.source: Inbound access to critical ports is always blocked.
trans-unit.target: Inbound access to critical ports is always blocked.

trans-unit.source: Provides the capability to connect to devices in close proximity to the PC via near-field communication (NFC).
trans-unit.target: Provides the capability to connect to devices in close proximity to the PC via near-field communication (NFC).

trans-unit.source: Near-field proximity may be used to send files or communicate with an app on the nearby device.
trans-unit.target: Near-field proximity may be used to send files or communicate with an app on the nearby device.

trans-unit.source: Provides the capability to add, change, or delete files on removable storage devices.
trans-unit.target: Provides the capability to add, change, or delete files on removable storage devices.

trans-unit.source: The app can only access the file types on removable storage that are defined in the manifest using the **File Type Associations** declaration.
trans-unit.target: The app can only access the file types on removable storage that are defined in the manifest using the **File Type Associations** declaration.

trans-unit.source: The app can't access removable storage on **HomeGroup** PCs.
trans-unit.target: The app can't access removable storage on **HomeGroup** PCs.

trans-unit.source: This capability is subject to the Windows Store policy.
trans-unit.target: This capability is subject to the Windows Store policy.

trans-unit.source: It provides the capability to access software and hardware certificates, such as smart card certificates, for validating a user's identity.
trans-unit.target: It provides the capability to access software and hardware certificates, such as smart card certificates, for validating a user's identity.

trans-unit.source: When related APIs are invoked at runtime, the user must take action (insert card, select certificate, etc.).
trans-unit.target: When related APIs are invoked at runtime, the user must take action (insert card, select certificate, etc.).

trans-unit.source: This capability is not necessary if your app includes a private certificate via a **Certificates** declaration.
trans-unit.target: This capability is not necessary if your app includes a private certificate via a **Certificates** declaration.

trans-unit.source: Gives apps the ability to access the user's name and picture.
trans-unit.target: Gives apps the ability to access the user's name and picture.

trans-unit.source: This capability is required to access some APIs in the [**Windows.System.UserProfile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR241881) namespace.
trans-unit.target: This capability is required to access some APIs in the [**Windows.System.UserProfile**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/BR241881) namespace.

trans-unit.source: Provides the capability to add, change, or delete files in the **Videos Library** for the local PC and **HomeGroup** PCs.
trans-unit.target: Provides the capability to add, change, or delete files in the **Videos Library** for the local PC and **HomeGroup** PCs.

trans-unit.source: Allows apps to access the VOIP calling APIs in the [**Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297266) namespace.
trans-unit.target: Allows apps to access the VOIP calling APIs in the [**Windows.ApplicationModel.Calls**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn297266) namespace.

trans-unit.source: Provides access to the built-in camera or attached webcam's video feed.
trans-unit.target: Provides access to the built-in camera or attached webcam's video feed.

trans-unit.source: This allows the app to capture snapshots and movies.
trans-unit.target: This allows the app to capture snapshots and movies.

trans-unit.source: Provides access to custom USB devices.
trans-unit.target: Provides access to custom USB devices.

trans-unit.source: This feature is not supported on Windows Phone.
trans-unit.target: This feature is not supported on Windows Phone.

trans-unit.source: Provides access to Human Interface Devices (HID).
trans-unit.target: Provides access to Human Interface Devices (HID).

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [How to specify device capabilities for HID](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn263091).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [How to specify device capabilities for HID](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn263091).

trans-unit.source: Provides access to Bluetooth LE devices through a collection of primary services, included services, characteristics, and descriptors.
trans-unit.target: Provides access to Bluetooth LE devices through a collection of primary services, included services, characteristics, and descriptors.

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [How to specify device capabilities for Bluetooth](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn263090).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [How to specify device capabilities for Bluetooth](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn263090).

trans-unit.source: Provides access to APIs that support the Basic Rate/Extended Data Rate (BR/EDR) transport and also lets your Windows Store app access a device that implements Serial Port Profile (SPP).
trans-unit.target: Provides access to APIs that support the Basic Rate/Extended Data Rate (BR/EDR) transport and also lets your Windows Store app access a device that implements Serial Port Profile (SPP).

trans-unit.source: For more info, see [How to specify device capabilities for Bluetooth](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn263090).
trans-unit.target: For more info, see [How to specify device capabilities for Bluetooth](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn263090).

trans-unit.source: Provides access to Point of Service (POS) barcode scanners and magnetic stripe readers.
trans-unit.target: Provides access to Point of Service (POS) barcode scanners and magnetic stripe readers.

trans-unit.source: This feature is not supported on Windows Phone.
trans-unit.target: This feature is not supported on Windows Phone.

trans-unit.source: Use the Windows Runtime API for communicating with your device
trans-unit.target: Use the Windows Runtime API for communicating with your device

trans-unit.source: The following table connects some of the capabilities to Windows Runtime APIs.
trans-unit.target: The following table connects some of the capabilities to Windows Runtime APIs.

trans-unit.source: See [Maps and location overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt219699) for more information.
trans-unit.target: See [Maps and location overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Mt219699) for more information.
